commits.message: OAuth filter customization per request
Fix GCE live tests
Fix DigitalOcean DropletApiLiveTest
Define the JDK version in a Maven property

JCLOUDS-1337: revert legacy aws-s3 storage class

This functionality was deprecated in 2.1.x and we will remove it in
2.2.x.  Partially reverts 89053d9a8b43ccc54c99e552eb5a868b236d1057.

JCLOUDS-1358: Handle 0-byte input with v4 signature

Previously this failed due to use of mark and reset on the
InputStream.

JCLOUDS-1358: Fix zero byte InputStream test input

Do not use ByteSource.empty() since it is backed by a
ByteArrayInputStream which supports reset.
Add exception cause

JCLOUDS-1110: Inject timeStamp into Atmos provider

This addresses a unit test failure.
JCLOUDS-1110: Atmos time-limited signed URLs

JCLOUDS-598: Populate additional MD5 field

Follow-on to a6337fdcc4c0962a16d6285597958949bf0f0e57.

Remove nonsense check for non-existent URL

This URL does not resolve and slows integration tests.
JCLOUDS-598: Populate Atmos MD5 from wschecksum

Return Atmos objectID as ETag

Previously Atmos returned null.  Also rework the fix for JCLOUDS-339
which does not reproduce with AT&T Synaptic.  Fixes gaul/s3proxy#247.

Tighten up test expectations

Follow on to 8b94febfeb7b55664fc6fca58bbc7ef20255c71c.
Include HTTP status code in illegal range error

Throw consistent exception on invalid range read

Previously S3, Swift, and local blobstores threw a generic
IllegalArgumentException for this uncommon error.  Instead
consistently throw HttpResponseException.

JCLOUDS-1080: remove spurious parameter from test

Follow on to 52044d23d9e87de45593ab5c3a21e6fcf768717d.
JCLOUDS-1080: request JSON only for list objects

JCLOUDS-1281: Improve Swift DLO tests

Add DynamicLargeObjectApiLiveTest to Rackspace Cloud Files suite and
use correct regionId so that tests pass.  Also remove duplicative
test.

JCLOUDS-1111: Overwrite objects via remove and put

This partially reverts commit
e446b5b8b433327d8a11c0364abb051cff833431.  AT&T Synaptic returns a
bogus error on with x-emc-force-overwrite:

HTTP 400, code=1012, message=There was a mismatch between the object
size and the specified extent size.
Fix a few Coverity defects

JCLOUDS-1337: restore tier from stub blob

This allows completeMultipartUpload to propagate the tier set in
initiateMultipartUpload.

issue_comments.body: Pushed to master as 15d27da73980ed753f8435e43cabd9f74bc79095 and 89ae3b4fa6b64deeea45fabb3ca151ca200872e8 and 2.0.x as 1a23a1634306fb64a81186946585b7eeab068a2c and 36b3dadf8c3f817c80f7edc639b449a2b40b9388.  Thank you for your contribution @neonbunny!
Please close this pull request as I lack the karma to do so.

commits.message: [JCLOUDS-1360] add support for block device mappings to Nova
JCLOUDS-1355: Enable VM creation without external IP address.

Use different content on overwrite.

When testing blobstore overwrite behavior, jclouds should use a blob
with different content (but same name).

Recognise CentOS images on AWS Marketplace

CentOS’ officially-supported AMIs are hosted on the AWS Marketplace.
This adds support for those images, recognising the AMI naming
convention and ensuring the OS metadata is parsed correctly and the
correct SSH login name is used.

There is no change to the default jclouds configuration and the
official CentOS images will not be detected by default. To use these
images, you must alter the ami-query properties to include searching
the “AWS Marketplace”, which has an owner ID of 679593333241. You must
also manually log on to the AWS Marketplace, select your chosen CentOS
image, and “subscribe” to it (you can do this by proceeding as if to
launch an image, but stopping after you have agreed to the subscription
and before launching).

issue_comments.body: whoops; let's raise this against the right repo
Can't figure out how to raise this against jclouds/jclouds - https://github.com/jclouds/jclouds/pulls. I will ask on the list.
That's a bit more like it - closing this in favour of https://github.com/jclouds/jclouds/pull/1059.
@andrewgaul Having performed some more robust tests, I'm happy that the 2nd commit completes this issue.
